attributes.action: LOOK  INTO THE UNFAIR TREATMENT OF STAFF
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details: While we are sympathetic to the situation you have described, we can not accept your petition as it does not relate to government policy, and instead relates to your individual circumstances.
reasons: The names of individuals, or information where they may be identified, in relation to criminal accusations
Statements that don't actually request any action
